## Summary

A brief description of the feature or improvement.

## Motivation

Why is this feature needed? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Solution

How do you envision this working? Include any relevant details:
- New parameters or CLI flags
- Algorithm changes
- Expected input/output format

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative approaches you've thought about.

## Additional Context

- Related papers or references
- Example datasets that would benefit from this feature
- Priority level (nice-to-have vs. critical for your workflow)
